title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives some advice to a historically great NFL team that is failing to keep up with the modern league and falling into irrelevance. He takes a look at Kevin Durant as he continues to hold out for a trade and why he's no longer considered a franchise center piece in the NBA. He believes Kenny Pickett is one the rookie quarterback who has everything he needs to succeed right away in the NFL this year. Plus, Super Bowl champion Torry Holt joins the show to tell Colin what makes the Rams organization so special. 6-year NFL veteran Isaiah Stanback joins the show in studio to explain why the Cowboys have struggled in the preseason and what we can expect from them in the regular season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
